sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import { Users} from '../../dummyData' export default function Post({post}) { //到時候用這個去filter follower // const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id===1) // console.log(user) return (
{Users.filter((u)=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like}個喜歡
{post.comment}個評論
) }
